notes: Can regenerate up to 75 mana in one minute.
The aura's buff lingers for 0.5 seconds.
Stacks with the Basilius Aura from Veil of Discord.

description: Ring given as a reward to the greatest mages.
trivia: Basilius is derived from the Greek word Basileus, meaning "king" or "emperor".
tips: In the early game and even into the mid game, the boost of mana regen is extremely useful for heroes with low intelligence growth like Troll Warlord.
info: For strength heroes, it grants 60 health, 0.3 health regen, 0.24% magic resistance, 0.48 armor, 3 attack speed, 0.15% movement speed, 36 mana, 0.15 mana regen, 0.21% spell damage and 3 attack damage.
For agility heroes, it grants 60 health, 0.3 health regen, 0.24% magic resistance, 0.48 armor, 3 attack speed, 0.15% movement speed, 36 mana, 0.15 mana regen, 0.21% spell damage and 3 attack damage.

For intelligence heroes, it grants 60 health, 0.3 health regen, 0.24% magic resistance, 0.48 armor, 3 attack speed, 0.15% movement speed, 36 mana, 0.15 mana regen, 0.21% spell damage and 3 attack damage.
